mdRecord.dcterms:description: Facade after the 1993 fire, before restoration

Klutho built this apartment building as a residence for movie stars such as Charles Chaplin who worked at the nearby movie studio Klutho also operated. A fire in 1993 nearly destroyed the three-story Klutho Building, gutting the interior and causing most of the building to collapse into the basement. Fire fighters, however, were able to save the front section, including the staircase, from serious damage.... After a five-year restoration project completed in 2004, the Klutho Building is the home of Operation New Hope, a faith-based nonprofit community development corporation. -- http://www.bizjournals.com/jacksonville/stories/2004/10/25/focus4.html#ixzz1FhcK22pn, http://www.operationnewhope.com/ [work]
